head.title: G-I Holdings reports earnings for Year to Dec 31

hedline.hl1: G-I Holdings reports earnings for Year to Dec 31

block.p: b-Included a charge of $ 20,800,000 which reflects adoption of Statement of Financial Accounting Standards 106 and 109. Previously issued results have been restated to conform to the new accounting standards. c-Net income and included pretax gain of $ 162.6 million from the intial public offering of the company's subsidiary, International Specialty Products Inc. Latest year's loss from continuing operations of $ 147,300,000 included $ 200 million after-tax charge in connection with asbestos-related liability claims. GAF Corp. said the 1992 results of G-I Holdings Inc. were affected by a decrease in net interest expense of $ 26.6 million and an improvement in other income of $ 7.8 million, partially offset by a decrease in operating incomes of $ 7.2 million and lower income from the GAF-Huls joint venture.
